response.original_title: PJ Masks: Time to Be a Hero
response.overview: Join Catboy, Owlette and Gekko on their nighttime missions, into the night to save the day!  Gekko's desire not to take the blame for stealing Cameron's mini-car allows Luna Girl to almost destroy HQ! Owlette tries to get back at Night Ninja by destroying his masterpiece statue, but she learns two wrongs don't make a right.
response.title: PJ Masks: Time to Be a Hero
